page.title: 06BRYN-FARMING HILL/VALLEY.
page.content: THERE ARE 9 FARMS IN BRYN,BUT ONLY 7 ARE IN OUR BLOCK.{PENHYDD FAWR {(J.PARR);PENHYDD WAELOD (E.J.ALLAN) {BRYNGURNOS (D.LEWIS);CIL Y GOFID {(D.JENKINS);GALLT Y CWM (A.THOMAS) {CILGARN (A.J.MORTIMER);BRYN TROED {GARN (R.JEFFRIES)}AND OUTSIDE THE AREA PEN Y CASTELL AND AFON WEN. MOST OF THE FARMS ARE TYPICAL HILL FARM.THEY ARE MAINLY STOCKED WITH SHEEP AND SOME CATTLE & PIGS,CHICKENS, GEESE AND HORSES TO A LESSER DEGREE. SWEDES,KALE&CABBAGE ARE THE MAIN CROPS WITH HAY OF MAJOR IMPORTANCE. WE VISITED{PENHYDD FARM }WITH MICHAEL PARR(CLASS 4)WHO LIVES THERE.HE GAVE US MOST OF THE INFORMATIN. MR.E.J.ALLAN,PENHYDD WAELOD,IS THE SCHOOL MILKMAN,BUT THE MILK IS COLLEC- TED FROM UNITED DAIRIES,PORT TALBOT.
